org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.di
Dependency injection API.

  • Uses of DI.FactoryBuilder in org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.di

    Methods in org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.di that return DI.FactoryBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.FactoryBuilder.addBundle(Object bundle)
    Adds a bundle class or instance to be registered after the ConfigurableInstanceFactory is initialized with service provider classes.
    DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.FactoryBuilder.addInitialBundle(Object bundle)
    Adds a bundle class or instance to be registered before the ConfigurableInstanceFactory is initialized with service provider classes.
    static DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.builder()
    Creates a new builder for customizing a ConfigurableInstanceFactory.
    DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.FactoryBuilder.copy()
    Creates a new builder DSL with a copy of the configured bindings from this builder.
    DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.UnscopedBindingBuilder.toFunction(Function<InstanceFactory,? extends Supplier<? extends T>> function)
    Adds a binding using a function that depends on InstanceFactory.
    DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.UnscopedBindingBuilder.toInstance(T instance)
    Adds the given instance as a binding to the configured key.
    DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.ScopedBindingBuilder.toProvider(Supplier<? extends T> provider)
    Adds a scoped binding to the given provider function.
    DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.UnscopedBindingBuilder.toSingleton(Supplier<? extends T> provider)
    Adds a singleton binding for the given supplier function.
    DI.FactoryBuilder
    DI.UnscopedBindingBuilder.toUnscoped(Supplier<? extends T> provider)
    Adds an unscoped binding for the given supplier function.
